newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian police find dynamite on Genoa funicular.
newsitem.headline: Italian police find dynamite on Genoa funicular.

text.p: Police found dynamite on a funicular railway in the northwest Italian port of Genoa on Monday after an anonymous tip-off.

Police said they defused four sticks of the explosives attached to a fuse after a man telephoned a local newspaper to warn of the planned explosion. They said it was not clear who planted the dynamite or why.
